definitions: the state of being absorbed in thought

examples.text: his face became strange with thoughtfulness
a man of quiet thoughtfulness and sound judgment

shortDefinitions: state of being absorbed in thought

examples.text: the jury was impressed by the thoughtfulness of the project
the question will be approached with thoughtfulness

definitions: consideration for the needs of other people

examples.text: her generosity and thoughtfulness was unbounded
I am touched by your thoughtfulness

shortDefinitions: consideration for needs of other people
